Articles.Content:
Well, I decided to make a KSP Mini Movie.

It's a pixelated and blurry mess, but I like it.

On that note, anyone have some good cinematic mods?

Enjoy (If you can see it):

[video=youtube;Z4p9XCmFhL0]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z4p9XCmFhL0[/video]

Nice! I like the use of those dual engines (I can't remember the name :3) as a first stage. I haven't seen/thought of doing it, and it looks very good!

(Kerbal Joint Reinforcement may have helped prevent the wobblies you had :))

[quote name='MrMeeb']Nice! I like the use of those dual engines (I can't remember the name :3) as a first stage. I haven't seen/thought of doing it, and it looks very good!

(Kerbal Joint Reinforcement may have helped prevent the wobblies you had :))[/QUOTE]

Thanks!

Try it out! It's a cool, new and innovated idea unfortunately not invented by me.

I;ll try KJR out.

Also, I enjoyed Cooperation. What Cinematic mods did you use?

DMSP

[quote name='DMSP']Thanks!

Try it out! It's a cool, new and innovated idea unfortunately not invented by me.

I;ll try KJR out.

Also, I enjoyed Cooperation. What Cinematic mods did you use?

DMSP[/QUOTE]

What do you mean by cinematic mods? I'm thinking CameraTools and HullcamVDS for camera angles

[quote name='MrMeeb']What do you mean by cinematic mods? I'm thinking CameraTools and HullcamVDS for camera angles[/QUOTE]

Thank you!
I like it! That was some funny stuff right there!!!...... and I thought I was the only one doing somersaults into space! :D

[quote name='castille7']I like it! That was some funny stuff right there!!!...... and I thought I was the only one doing somersaults into space! :D[/QUOTE]

Thank you!

It happens to the best of us :)
